A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left this movie more giddy than I can remember ever being before. I laughed\, I cried\, I screamed\, I slapped my friend more than strictly necessary. This movie was a massive undertaking and definitely had its flaws\, but the overall product was a sensory masterpiece and managed to balance character personality and humor with deeper lessons. One of the best movies I've seen in a while\, especially since I don't expect cinematic perfection from scifi/fantasy movies.
